author: deme1744
content:
Nimbus now has the new version of the history network implemented (https://github.com/ethereum/portal-network-specs/blob/dd7b7cbae96a1c54546263d8484f1aa01c5035b9/history/history-network.md). 
However not yet the recently merged PR: https://github.com/ethereum/portal-network-specs/pull/408

The network is also not yet default activated on our `nimbus_portal_client` nor on our fleet as we still need to adjust the integration with our Nimbus EL (this was done for the legacy history network, but now needs adjustment).
This will be the next step, at which point I will also take down & reset current nodes of our fleet (that run the history legacy network). I won't be able to work on this for a few weeks however so it will still take some time before this step is done.

I'm curious to hear how other teams are moving. <@822475622956662814> <@466705218588114954> <@194432762315407360> Is there any progress / work done on this?
